text:
="preserve">Ângelo Gaspar Martins (19 April 1930 – 11 October 2020), simply known as Ângelo, was a Portuguese footballer. He played as a defender for Benfica and the Portugal national team. His career lasted from 1945 to 1962. He was born in Porto, Portugal.
Martins died on 11 October 2020 at the age of 90.
